page.title: 07Travel.
page.content:
Most people in our area have cars because{travelling can be difficult. Local buses run just a few times a day. From Pensilva there are only three buses to Liskeard and one to Launceston each day. There are no buses on Sundays. The nearest railway station is in Liskeard. From here you can travel to Plymouth where you can get trains to anywhere in the country. You can see that{owning a car is {necessary}if you wish to do things when you want to, like going to work, shopping trips, visits to hospitals and travelling for pleasure.
{Anna Marie Deeble. {Robert Ian Paul.
